content: Award The **Singapore Armed Forces Good Service Medal** is [awarded](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) to a regular career soldier of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) (SAF) who has satisfactorily completed 5 years of dedicated service. The medal may be awarded to [NSmen](/wiki/NSmen) who have served 2 years of National Service Full-time (NSF) and at least 3 high-key In-Camp Training (ICT) served satisfactorily as NSmen. The criteria are based on a reservist's good attitude towards National Service, in-camp training competency performance and meaningful contributions to the SAF. ## Description - The ribbon is orange, with two white stripes. ## Service medals In the SAF, the medals for service are: - 5 years - Singapore Armed Forces Good Service Medal - 10 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(10_Years)_Medal) - 15 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (10 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(10_Years)_Medal) with 15 year clasp - 20 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(20_Years)_Medal) - 25 years - [Long Service Medal (Military)](/wiki/Long_Service_Medal_(Military)_(Singapore)) - 30 years - [Singapore Armed Forces Long Service and Good Conduct (20 Years) Medal](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Long_Service_and_Good_Conduct_(20_Years)_Medal) with 30 year clasp - Singapore MINDEF Factsheet: Review of SAF medals - Singaporean Army Medals Factsheet This Singapore-related article is a stub. title: Singapore Armed Forces Good Service Medal
